title: Keeping electricity safe inside the home
creator_credit: Lex Halliday, Jean Halliday, Sydney County Council and Australian Instructional Films
brief_description: Informative study of all the checks that should be made on day to day use of electrical equipment in the home (irons, toasters etc) and precautions to be taken with a general knowledge of electrical operation and illustrated details.
creator_credit_for_label: Lex Halliday, Jean Halliday, Sydney County Council and Australian Instructional Films
